wikipedia_page.main: Captain Peter Gerald Charles Dickens DSO, MBE, DSC, RN (6 April 1917 – 25 May 1987) was a Royal Navy officer during World War II and a great-grandson of novelist Charles Dickens.

response: Blagrove's wife was Edith Gordon Lowe, who was Scottish, from Edinburgh. Their daughter, Mary Alice Blagrove, married Royal Navy officer Peter Gerald Charles Dickens. Blagrove's great-grandson is actor Harry Lloyd.
*Peter Gerald Charles Dickens (1917–1987), Royal Navy captain
:::::* Peter Gerald Charles Dickens (1917–1987), captain in the Royal Navy
* Peter Gerald Charles Dickens (1917–1987), great grandson of Charles Dickens and a Captain in the Royal Navy
